      • createDirectories

        public static void createDirectories​(java.lang.String absolutePath)
        Creates all missing directories in the given absolutePath.
        Parameters:
        absolutePath - the path to be created in the file system

      • copyClasspathFile

        public static void copyClasspathFile​(java.lang.String classpathLocation,
                                     java.lang.String absoluteFolderPath)
        Copies a file from the classpath identified by classpathLocation to the given absoluteFolderPath. Please note that it is expected that this folder exists.
        Parameters:
        classpathLocation - the classpath location to copy the file from
        absoluteFolderPath - the destination folder as absolute folder path

      • copyFile

        public static void copyFile​(java.lang.String absoluteFilePath,
                            java.lang.String absoluteFolderPath)
        Copies a file located under absoluteFilePath to the given absoluteFolderPath. Please note that it is expected that this folder exists.
        Parameters:
        absoluteFilePath - the absolute path to the file
        absoluteFolderPath - the destination folder as absolute folder path

      • makeExecutable

        public static boolean makeExecutable​(java.lang.String absoluteFilePath)
        Makes an external file executable (i.e. it is setting the "executable" flag in the filesystem, if supported)
        Parameters:
        absoluteFilePath - the absolute path to the file
        Returns:
        true, if the flag has been successfully set, false otherwise.
